title: [K-12] Foundational English Grammar Enhancement Program: Grammar Test-Based Pedagogical Approach

context.additional_context: A program designed to enhance foundational English grammar skills for college freshmen, conducted in a blended online/offline learning environment, with a focus on analyzing learners' grammatical weaknesses and providing personalized feedback.

learning_goals: Learners construct sentences using seven core grammar elements (modal verbs, verbs, pronouns, prepositions, nouns, adjectives, adverbs) with over 85% accuracy.
Learners improve average scores in target grammar domains by over 20% in weekly diagnostic assessments.
Learners identify and correct at least three grammar errors based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
